items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.

items.content_html: askFlow is a lightweight internal tool for managing projects and tasks. It provides a simple and intuitive interface for tracking work across multiple projects, with features like a Kanban board, task priorities, due dates, and more.
items.title: sanakareem/taskflow: askFlow is a lightweight internal tool for managing projects and tasks. It provides a simple and intuitive interface for tracking work across multiple projects, with features like a Kanban board, task priorities, due dates, and more.

items.content_html: A modern, lightweight backend application built with Bun and HonoJS. This project features a fully type-safe architecture, leveraging HonoJS RPCs for efficient routing, Zod for robust validation, and Drizzle ORM for seamless database interactions.
items.title: iamVihanga/Bun-Hono-Advanced-Backend: A modern, lightweight backend application built with Bun and HonoJS. This project features a fully type-safe architecture, leveraging HonoJS RPCs for efficient routing, Zod for robust validation, and Drizzle ORM for seamless database interactions.

items.content_html: A lightweight, minimalist documentation system.
items.title: Meekiavelique/mdoc: A lightweight, minimalist documentation system.

items.content_html: This project initializes a basic Express.js server connected to a SQLite database (userDate.db). It uses the sqlite and sqlite3 packages to open the database and ensures the server listens on port 3010. Ideal for lightweight apps needing persistent local data without external DBs.
items.title: Jagadeeshroc/Backend-initializing-DB: This project initializes a basic Express.js server connected to a SQLite database (userDate.db). It uses the sqlite and sqlite3 packages to open the database and ensures the server listens on port 3010. Ideal for lightweight apps needing persistent local data without external DBs.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
items.title: AR10Dev/DragBoard: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.

items.content_html: The Task Manager App is a lightweight, user-friendly web app built using React and LocalStorage. Designed as a PoC, it enables efficient daily task management with a modern, responsive UI. It highlights best practices in front-end development and UI/UX design with dynamic interactivity and persistent storage.
items.title: gontuvamsi/task-manager: The Task Manager App is a lightweight, user-friendly web app built using React and LocalStorage. Designed as a PoC, it enables efficient daily task management with a modern, responsive UI. It highlights best practices in front-end development and UI/UX design with dynamic interactivity and persistent storage.

items.content_html: fast-ai-text-summary is a lightweight and blazing-fast Node.js package that summarizes large blocks of text into concise, meaningful sentences using basic NLP and frequency-based extractive summarization. Ideal for chatbots, content previews, reports, and AI assistants. Easy to use and customizable.
items.title: AkshayPanchivala/fast-ai-text-summary: fast-ai-text-summary is a lightweight and blazing-fast Node.js package that summarizes large blocks of text into concise, meaningful sentences using basic NLP and frequency-based extractive summarization. Ideal for chatbots, content previews, reports, and AI assistants. Easy to use and customizable.
